def_en: Clothes that are in tatters are badly torn in several places, so that pieces can easily come off.

def_cn: (计划、心情等)千疮百孔，历经挫折，不堪一击
def_en: If you say that something such as a plan or a person's state of mind is in tatters, you are emphasizing that it is weak, has suffered a lot of damage, and is likely to fail completely.
